alert.note: Alert for Eastern Walsh County; Grand Forks; Pembina; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 20 at 2:08PM CST until December 22 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM WEDNESDAY TO 6 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Minnesota and northeast and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 3 AM CST Wednesday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 3 AM Wednesday to 6 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...1 to 3 inches of snow is expected late tonight through Thursday morning.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. If outside, make sure you wear appropriate winter clothing. Use caution while outside. Wear appropriate winter clothing.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Walsh County; Grand Forks; Pembina; Traill
